attributes.comment:
I am shocked to hear about the fee increase without addressing any concrete
provisions to remove the basic problems of "WAIT" one has to go through. Agreed,
it is outside the jurisdiction of USCIS to decide on many
aspects of WAIT ( eg. retrogression) but even the basic services from USCIS
takes months.
In their proposol to fee hikes, USCIS should come up with a concrete remedial
steps they will conduct with the additional budget on how they will improve the
processing time...
If the effect of improvement is seen only after 2009( as specified by USCIS) what
good will it serve me to pay 3 times more NOW when I still have to wait for
months/years...If USCIS processes my case 3 times faster I dont mind paying 3
times more !!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By K.R.Tamang
